## IRegisterWithAs.within() method

Specifies resolution instance scope. Scope determines how resolved service instances behave in between resolutions

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
within(scope: ScopeType): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | <code>ScopeType</code> | the value of the scope [ScopeType](./typeioc.scopetype.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

- void
